data.content:
Miss Fortune: The Bounty Hunter

Release Date: September 8, 2010

Miss Fortune, also known as Sarah Fortune, is a renowned bounty hunter in the world of League of Legends. With her dual pistols, she strikes fear into the hearts of her enemies and leaves a trail of destruction in her wake. This article will delve into her captivating story, her strengths and weaknesses, her background in the game, and her significant role in the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Miss Fortune

Born into a wealthy family in the city of Bilgewater, Miss Fortune's life took a tragic turn when her parents were murdered by the infamous gangster, Gangplank. Determined to seek revenge, she dedicated her life to becoming a skilled bounty hunter, honing her marksmanship and combat skills to perfection.

Driven by her desire for justice, Miss Fortune set out on a relentless quest to bring Gangplank to justice and restore order to Bilgewater. Along the way, she encountered numerous challenges and faced dangerous adversaries, but her unwavering determination and sharpshooting abilities allowed her to overcome every obstacle in her path.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Miss Fortune possesses a unique set of strengths that make her a formidable force on the battlefield. Her primary strength lies in her exceptional damage output, particularly in the early and mid-game stages. Armed with her dual pistols, she can unleash a barrage of bullets upon her enemies, shredding through their health bars with ease.

Furthermore, Miss Fortune's ability to apply area-of-effect damage with her ultimate ability, Bullet Time, allows her to decimate entire teams in team fights. This makes her a valuable asset in team compositions that rely on wombo combos or engage strategies.

However, Miss Fortune does have her weaknesses. One of her main vulnerabilities is her lack of mobility. Unlike some other champions, she lacks a reliable escape mechanism, making her susceptible to ganks and crowd control effects. Additionally, her reliance on her ultimate ability for significant damage output means that she can be less impactful in skirmishes or when her ultimate is on cooldown.

Background in the Game

Miss Fortune has been a staple in the League of Legends roster since her release on September 8, 2010. Her popularity stems from her engaging gameplay mechanics, visually appealing abilities, and intriguing lore. As a marksman, she is primarily played in the bottom lane as an ADC (Attack Damage Carry), where she can farm gold and experience to become a late-game powerhouse.

Throughout the years, Miss Fortune has received various balance changes and updates to ensure her viability in the ever-evolving meta. Her kit has been fine-tuned to provide a mix of sustained damage and burst potential, allowing players to adapt their playstyle based on the situation at hand.

Miss Fortune's Place in the Game

Miss Fortune holds a significant place in the League of Legends universe, both in terms of gameplay and lore. Her character design and story have captivated players, making her one of the most recognizable champions in the game.

From a gameplay perspective, Miss Fortune's versatility allows her to fit into a variety of team compositions. Whether it's as the primary damage dealer in a team fight or as a lane bully in the early game, she brings a unique set of tools to the table. Her ability to dominate the laning phase and snowball leads has made her a popular pick in both casual and professional play.

Moreover, Miss Fortune's lore intertwines with other champions from Bilgewater, such as Gangplank and Twisted Fate, creating a rich narrative that adds depth to the game's world. Her ongoing quest for justice and her personal vendetta against Gangplank make her a compelling character with a strong sense of purpose.

Explore Miss Fortune's Skins

On our website, you can access information and videos showcasing all of Miss Fortune's skins. From the classic Captain Fortune to the futuristic Bullet Angel, each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience. Whether you prefer a more traditional look or want to embrace a different persona, Miss Fortune's skins allow you to express your style and stand out on the Rift.

Visit our page dedicated to Miss Fortune's skins to explore the full range of options and find the perfect look for your bounty-hunting adventures.

Miss Fortune (Prestige Bewitching Miss Fortune)

RP Cost: 100 Prestige Points | Release Date: October 2021

Miss Fortune, the Bounty Hunter, is a popular champion in the online multiplayer game League of Legends. Known for her deadly aim and seductive charm, she has become a fan favorite since her release in 2010. Over the years, Miss Fortune has received numerous skins, each with its own unique theme and design. One of her most coveted skins is the

which was released in October 2021.

The

skin is a limited edition skin that can only be obtained through the use of Prestige Points. These points are earned by participating in special events and completing missions within the game. With its enchanting Halloween theme, this skin transforms Miss Fortune into a bewitching sorceress, complete with a magical staff and a flowing, ethereal gown.

The attention to detail in this skin is truly remarkable. From the intricate lace patterns on her dress to the glowing runes on her staff, every aspect of the

skin exudes elegance and mystique. The color palette of deep purples and blacks adds to the overall enchanting atmosphere, making Miss Fortune a true femme fatale on the battlefield.

Not only does the

skin change her appearance, but it also includes new visual and sound effects. Her abilities are transformed into magical spells, with colorful bursts of energy and sparkling particles. The sound effects are also modified to match the theme, adding an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience.

Now, let's delve into the story of Miss Fortune herself. Sarah Fortune, also known as Miss Fortune, is a captain of the Bilgewater underworld. She is driven by a desire for revenge against Gangplank, the pirate who killed her family and left her for dead. With her dual pistols,

Miss Fortune is a formidable marksman who excels at dealing high amounts of damage from a distance.

Miss Fortune's strengths lie in her ability to quickly burst down enemies with her Q ability,
which allows her to shoot two bullets in quick succession. Her W ability,
grants her bonus movement speed, making her highly mobile and difficult to catch. Additionally, her ultimate ability,

is a devastating barrage of bullets that can decimate entire teams if used correctly.

However, Miss Fortune also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility without her W ability. This makes her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, her ultimate ability requires her to stand still, leaving her open to crowd control effects and skillshots from the enemy team.

In the world of League of Legends, Miss Fortune holds a significant place. She is not only a powerful champion but also a symbol of strength and resilience. Her story of seeking revenge and overcoming adversity resonates with players, making her a beloved character in the game's lore.

If you want to learn more about Miss Fortune and her various appearances in the game, you can find detailed information and videos on this page. From her classic skin to the
each iteration of Miss Fortune brings something unique to the game, allowing players to fully immerse themselves in her captivating story and gameplay.

Miss Fortune (Pool Party Miss Fortune)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: July 1, 2013

Pool Party Miss Fortune is a delightful skin that brings a splash of summer fun to the world of League of Legends. Released on July 1, 2013, this skin allows players to experience the thrill of the beach while embodying the iconic bounty hunter, Miss Fortune. With its vibrant colors, playful animations, and unique visual effects, Pool Party Miss Fortune is a must-have for any fan of the game.

The Story of Pool Party Miss Fortune

In the Pool Party universe, Miss Fortune takes on the role of a lifeguard, ready to protect and serve on the sunny shores. Clad in a stylish and revealing lifeguard outfit, she exudes confidence and charm. Her classic dual pistols are replaced with water guns, adding a playful twist to her deadly arsenal. As she struts along the beach, her hair flows in the wind, and her vibrant bikini catches the eye of everyone around her.

Pool Party Miss Fortune's abilities also receive a refreshing makeover. Her Q ability, Double Up, now shoots out water balloons that burst upon impact. Her W ability, Strut, leaves behind a trail of footprints in the sand as she walks. When activating her E ability, Make It Rain, she summons a torrent of water droplets that drench her enemies. Finally, her ultimate ability, Bullet Time, transforms into a powerful wave of water that crashes down on her foes.

With its attention to detail and playful theme, Pool Party Miss Fortune is a skin that truly captures the essence of summer and brings a lighthearted twist to the world of League of Legends.

Miss Fortune: The Bounty Hunter

Miss Fortune, also known as Sarah Fortune, is a renowned bounty hunter in the world of League of Legends. Born into a wealthy family, her life took a tragic turn when her parents were murdered by the infamous gangster, Gangplank. Seeking revenge, Miss Fortune dedicated her life to hunting down and eliminating Gangplank and his crew.

In the game, Miss Fortune is a marksman who excels at dealing high amounts of physical damage from a distance. Her passive ability, Love Tap, allows her basic attacks to deal bonus damage to targets affected by her abilities. Her Q ability, Double Up, allows her to shoot a bullet that ricochets off the first target hit, dealing damage to a second target behind it. Her W ability, Strut, grants her bonus movement speed and passive attack speed, making her a formidable force in team fights. Her E ability, Make It Rain, creates an area of effect that slows enemies and deals damage over time. Finally, her ultimate ability, Bullet Time, channels a barrage of bullets in a cone, dealing massive damage to all enemies caught in its path.

Miss Fortune's strengths lie in her ability to quickly burst down enemies with her high damage output. Her passive and Q ability allow her to efficiently trade damage in the laning phase, while her ultimate ability can devastate entire teams in team fights. Additionally, her W ability grants her mobility and attack speed, making her a slippery target to catch.

However, Miss Fortune also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility without her W ability. Her reliance on her ultimate ability for team fight impact means that she can be vulnerable when it is on cooldown. Additionally, her short attack range makes her susceptible to poke from long-range champions.

In the world of League of Legends, Miss Fortune has become an iconic champion known for her deadly beauty and relentless pursuit of justice. Whether players choose to embrace her Pool Party persona or opt for her classic appearance, Miss Fortune remains a force to be reckoned with on the Rift.

Explore Miss Fortune's Appearances

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Miss Fortune's appearances in the game. From her classic look to the playful Pool Party skin, each appearance offers a unique visual experience that enhances the gameplay and immerses players in the world of League of Legends.

Whether you prefer the fierce bounty hunter or the carefree lifeguard, Miss Fortune's appearances showcase the versatility and creativity of the game's design team. So dive in and discover the many faces of Miss Fortune!

Miss Fortune (Road Warrior Miss Fortune)

RP Cost: 1350 | Release Date: August 25, 2015

Miss Fortune, the Bounty Hunter, is a renowned champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With her fierce determination and deadly aim, she has become a fan favorite among players. One of her most iconic skins is the

which showcases her as a fearless warrior ready to conquer the battlefield.

The Road Warrior Miss Fortune skin was released on August 25, 2015, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. This skin transforms Miss Fortune into a post-apocalyptic warrior, complete with a rugged outfit, a modified gun, and a fierce attitude. It offers players a unique and exciting way to experience the game while embodying the spirit of a road warrior.

The Story of Road Warrior Miss Fortune

In the dystopian world of the skin's theme, Miss Fortune has adapted to survive in a lawless wasteland. She has become a road warrior, traversing the desolate highways and battling rival gangs for control. Her once elegant and refined appearance has been replaced with a rugged and battle-worn outfit, reflecting her transformation into a hardened survivor.

Road Warrior Miss Fortune's outfit features a combination of leather, metal, and fabric, providing both protection and mobility. Her signature dual pistols have been modified to fit the post-apocalyptic aesthetic, with additional attachments and enhancements. The skin's attention to detail is remarkable, with weathered textures and intricate designs that truly bring the character to life.

As Miss Fortune roams the wasteland, she leaves a trail of destruction in her wake. Her abilities have been visually modified to match the theme of the skin. Her Q ability,
now fires explosive rounds, leaving a fiery explosion upon impact. Her W ability,
showcases her resilience and determination as she confidently walks through the chaos. Her E ability,
summons a storm of bullets, raining destruction upon her enemies. Finally, her ultimate ability,

unleashes a barrage of bullets, obliterating anyone in her path.

Miss Fortune's Story and Role in League of Legends

Miss Fortune, also known as Sarah Fortune, is a champion in League of Legends who hails from the city of Bilgewater. She is a feared bounty hunter and pirate captain, seeking revenge against Gangplank, the man who killed her family and destroyed her life. With her dual pistols, she is a deadly marksman capable of dealing massive damage from a distance.

In the game, Miss Fortune is primarily played in the bot lane as an ADC (Attack Damage Carry). Her high damage output and ability to quickly eliminate enemies make her a formidable force in team fights. She excels at dealing sustained damage and has the potential to snowball the game if she gains an early advantage.

Miss Fortune's strengths lie in her ability to harass enemies with her Q ability,
which allows her to hit multiple targets with a single shot. Her W ability,
grants her bonus movement speed, making her difficult to catch or escape from. Her ultimate ability,

is a devastating AoE (Area of Effect) ability that can turn the tide of team fights.

However, Miss Fortune also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with crowd control abilities. Her reliance on her ultimate ability for significant damage means that she can be easily interrupted or mitigated by enemy team compositions with strong crowd control or shields.

Despite her weaknesses, Miss Fortune remains a popular pick among players due to her high damage potential and satisfying gameplay. Her unique character design and captivating lore make her a beloved champion in the League of Legends community.

Explore Miss Fortune's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Miss Fortune and her various appearances in League of Legends, you can find detailed information and videos on her dedicated page. Discover her other skins, such as Captain Fortune, Arcade Miss Fortune, and Pool Party Miss Fortune, each offering a different visual and thematic experience. Immerse yourself in the world of Miss Fortune and unleash her deadly skills on the Rift!

Miss Fortune (Secret Agent Miss Fortune)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: November 29, 2012

Secret Agent Miss Fortune is a stunning skin that brings a touch of espionage and mystery to the world of League of Legends. Released on November 29, 2012, this skin allows players to embody the role of a secret agent, ready to take down any enemy that stands in their way. With its sleek design and intricate details, Secret Agent Miss Fortune is a must-have for any fan of the Bounty Hunter.

The Story of Secret Agent Miss Fortune

In the world of League of Legends, Secret Agent Miss Fortune is a renowned spy who operates in the shadows, using her cunning and marksmanship to complete her missions. Dressed in a sleek black suit, she blends seamlessly into the night, ready to strike fear into the hearts of her enemies.

The costume itself is a perfect representation of a classic secret agent, with a black suit, a stylish hat, and a red tie that adds a pop of color to the overall look. The attention to detail is impeccable, from the intricate stitching on the suit to the sleek lines of the hat. Secret Agent Miss Fortune exudes confidence and elegance, making her a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

One of the standout features of this skin is the addition of a silenced pistol, replacing Miss Fortune's traditional dual pistols. This small but significant change adds to the overall spy theme, giving players the feeling of being a stealthy operative. The silenced pistol emits a subtle sound when fired, further enhancing the immersive experience of playing as a secret agent.

Furthermore, Secret Agent Miss Fortune's abilities have also been modified to fit the theme. Her Q ability, Double Up, now fires a high-tech projectile that bounces between enemies, leaving them vulnerable to her attacks. Her W ability, Strut, allows her to move with increased agility, evoking the image of a skilled spy maneuvering through dangerous situations. Her E ability, Make It Rain, showers enemies with high-tech explosives, causing chaos and confusion. Finally, her ultimate ability, Bullet Time, unleashes a barrage of bullets from her silenced pistol, decimating anyone caught in its path.

Miss Fortune: The Bounty Hunter

Miss Fortune, also known as Sarah Fortune, is a highly skilled bounty hunter hailing from the city of Bilgewater. With her dual pistols and a thirst for revenge, she seeks to bring justice to those who have wronged her. In the world of League of Legends, Miss Fortune is a versatile marksman who excels at dealing damage from a distance.

Miss Fortune's strengths lie in her ability to quickly burst down enemies with her high damage output. Her Q ability, Double Up, allows her to hit multiple targets with a single shot, making her a threat in team fights. Her W ability, Strut, grants her increased movement speed, allowing her to reposition herself and escape dangerous situations. Her E ability, Make It Rain, slows enemies and deals damage over time, making it an effective zoning tool. Finally, her ultimate ability, Bullet Time, unleashes a hail of bullets in a cone-shaped area, dealing massive damage to anyone caught in its path.

However, Miss Fortune also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with crowd control abilities. Additionally, her abilities have relatively long cooldowns, requiring careful management to maximize her damage output. Despite these weaknesses, a skilled Miss Fortune player can dominate the battlefield and carry their team to victory.

In the world of League of Legends, Miss Fortune has become an iconic champion, known for her striking appearance and deadly skills. With her dual pistols and her signature strut, she commands attention wherever she goes. Whether you prefer her classic look or the sleek and mysterious Secret Agent Miss Fortune, there is no denying her impact on the game.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Miss Fortune's appearances, including the Secret Agent Miss Fortune skin. Explore her different looks and discover the versatility and power of this beloved champion.

Miss Fortune (Prestige Broken Covenant Miss Fortune)

RP Cost: 100 Prestige Points | Release Date: November 2021

Miss Fortune, the Bounty Hunter, is a formidable champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With her dual pistols and cunning tactics, she strikes fear into the hearts of her enemies. As one of the most iconic and beloved champions in the game, Miss Fortune has received numerous skins over the years, each with its own unique theme and design. One of her most recent and highly sought-after skins is the
The

skin is a special edition skin that was released in November 2021. It is part of the prestigious Prestige skin line, which offers players a chance to obtain exclusive and visually stunning skins for their favorite champions. To acquire this skin, players must spend 100 Prestige Points, which can be earned through various in-game events or purchased directly from the League of Legends store.

Now, let's delve into the details of the

skin. This skin transforms Miss Fortune into a fearsome pirate captain, ready to conquer the high seas. Her outfit features intricate details, including a stylish tricorn hat, a flowing coat adorned with gold accents, and a pair of pistols that exude power and elegance. The skin also includes unique visual effects, such as shimmering golden bullets and a stunning recall animation where Miss Fortune showcases her mastery of the seas.

Aside from the visual enhancements, the

skin also comes with new sound effects and voice lines. Miss Fortune's voice takes on a more commanding tone, reflecting her role as a pirate captain. Her quotes are filled with confidence and determination, further immersing players into the world of this fierce and relentless bounty hunter.

Now, let's shift our focus to Miss Fortune herself and explore her story and role within the League of Legends universe. Miss Fortune, also known as Sarah Fortune, is a captain of the Bilgewater pirate gang known as the
She seeks revenge against Gangplank, the pirate king who betrayed her family and left them to die. With her dual pistols,

she hunts down her enemies and brings justice to the lawless streets of Bilgewater.

Miss Fortune's strengths lie in her ability to deal massive amounts of physical damage from a safe distance. Her Q ability,

allows her to shoot a bullet that ricochets off her target, hitting a second enemy behind them. This ability is perfect for harassing opponents in the laning phase and can quickly turn the tide of team fights. Additionally, her ultimate ability,

unleashes a barrage of bullets in a cone-shaped area, dealing devastating damage to all enemies caught in its path.

However, Miss Fortune also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, her abilities require careful positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness. Players must be mindful of their positioning and take advantage of Miss Fortune's range to stay safe while dealing damage.

In the lore of League of Legends, Miss Fortune's story is intertwined with the city of Bilgewater, a lawless port town filled with pirates, smugglers, and other unsavory characters. She is a symbol of justice and retribution, seeking to bring order to the chaotic streets of Bilgewater. Her past is filled with tragedy and loss, but she channels her pain into her relentless pursuit of Gangplank and her mission to protect the innocent.

If you want to learn more about Miss Fortune and her various appearances in the game, you can find detailed information and videos on her champion page on the official League of Legends website. There, you can explore her other skins, including the classic
skin, the futuristic
skin, and the elegant

skin. Each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience, allowing players to customize their gameplay and showcase their personal style.

In conclusion, the

skin is a stunning addition to Miss Fortune's collection of skins. With its intricate design, new visual effects, and captivating voice lines, it offers players a chance to embody the fierce pirate captain and dominate the battlefield. Whether you're a fan of Miss Fortune or simply appreciate high-quality skins, the
skin is a must-have for any League of Legends player.

Miss Fortune (Bewitching Miss Fortune)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: October 29, 2015

Miss Fortune, the Bounty Hunter, is a renowned champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With her dual pistols and cunning tactics, she has become a fan-favorite among players. One of her most captivating skins is the

costume, which adds a touch of magic and mystery to her already formidable presence on the battlefield.

The

skin was released on October 29, 2015, just in time for the Halloween season. It is a part of the Bewitching skin line, which features other champions in enchanting and spooky outfits. This particular skin transforms Miss Fortune into a bewitching sorceress, complete with a pointed hat, flowing robes, and a broomstick that replaces her iconic dual pistols.

The attention to detail in the

skin is truly remarkable. The vibrant purple and black color scheme perfectly captures the essence of a witch, while the intricate patterns on her robes add an extra layer of elegance. The broomstick, adorned with magical symbols, is a clever twist on her usual firearms and adds a unique flair to her abilities.

When it comes to gameplay, the

skin offers more than just visual appeal. The animations and visual effects have been carefully crafted to match the theme, making her abilities feel even more magical. Her Q ability, Double Up, now sends out a mystical energy blast, while her W ability, Strut, leaves behind a trail of sparkling dust as she moves. The ultimate ability, Bullet Time, unleashes a flurry of enchanted projectiles that rain down on her enemies.

Now, let's delve into the story of Miss Fortune herself. Sarah Fortune, also known as Miss Fortune, is a fearless and cunning bounty hunter from the city of Bilgewater. She seeks revenge against Gangplank, the pirate who murdered her family and left her for dead. With her unmatched marksmanship and strategic mind, she has become a formidable force in the criminal underworld.

In the game, Miss Fortune is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing high amounts of physical damage from a distance. Her passive ability, Love Tap, allows her basic attacks to deal bonus damage to targets affected by her abilities. This synergizes well with her Q ability, Double Up, which allows her to shoot two bullets in quick succession, damaging the target and a nearby enemy.

Miss Fortune's W ability, Strut, grants her bonus movement speed when she hasn't taken damage recently. This ability allows her to reposition quickly in team fights or chase down fleeing enemies. Her E ability, Make It Rain, rains down bullets in a target area, slowing enemies and dealing damage over time. This ability is particularly useful for crowd control and zoning enemies.

Finally, Miss Fortune's ultimate ability, Bullet Time, is a devastating barrage of bullets that she fires in a cone-shaped area in front of her. This ability can deal massive damage to multiple enemies, making it a game-changer in team fights or when clearing waves of minions.

Miss Fortune's strengths lie in her ability to deal consistent damage from a safe distance, making her a formidable threat in the late game. Her mobility and crowd control abilities also make her a valuable asset in team fights. However, she is relatively squishy and lacks escape tools, making her vulnerable to assassins and burst damage champions.

Overall, Miss Fortune's
skin adds a touch of magic and allure to an already captivating champion. Whether you're a fan of her lore, gameplay, or simply enjoy collecting unique skins,

is a must-have for any Miss Fortune enthusiast.

For more information about Miss Fortune and to see all her appearances in the game, including the
skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to her on the official League of Legends website. There, you can find detailed information, videos, and more to enhance your Miss Fortune experience.

Miss Fortune (Ruined Miss Fortune)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: April 29, 2021

Miss Fortune, the Bounty Hunter, is a popular champion in the game League of Legends. Known for her dual pistols and deadly aim, she has become a fan favorite for her high damage output and stylish appearance. One of her most iconic skins is

which was released on April 29, 2021, and can be purchased for 1350 RP.

The Story of Ruined Miss Fortune

Ruined Miss Fortune is part of the Ruined skin line, which features champions corrupted by the Black Mist. In this skin, Miss Fortune has succumbed to the darkness and become a fearsome pirate captain of the undead. Her once vibrant and colorful attire has been replaced with tattered clothing and ghostly blue hues, reflecting her transformation into a haunting figure.

The Ruined Miss Fortune skin showcases the duality of her character, combining her deadly nature as a bounty hunter with the eerie presence of the Black Mist. Her pistols have been infused with the dark energy of the Mist, giving them an otherworldly glow. Her hair flows freely, as if being carried by an unseen wind, adding to her ghostly appearance.

One of the standout features of the Ruined Miss Fortune skin is her ultimate ability, Bullet Time. In this skin, the Black Mist engulfs her as she unleashes a barrage of spectral bullets upon her enemies. The visual effects and sound design of this ability perfectly capture the haunting essence of the Ruined theme.

Overall, the Ruined Miss Fortune skin offers players a unique and captivating visual experience, allowing them to embody the dark side of Miss Fortune's character.

Miss Fortune's Story and Gameplay

Miss Fortune, also known as Sarah Fortune, is a champion with a rich lore and a strong presence in the game. She hails from the city of Bilgewater, a lawless port town filled with pirates and cutthroats. Miss Fortune's parents were brutally murdered by the infamous gangster, Gangplank, which fueled her desire for revenge.

In the game, Miss Fortune is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing high amounts of physical damage from a distance. Her passive ability, Love Tap, allows her basic attacks to deal bonus damage to enemies she has recently attacked. This makes her a formidable threat in team fights and skirmishes.

One of Miss Fortune's defining abilities is her Q ability, Double Up. She fires a shot at an enemy target, which then bounces to a nearby enemy, dealing damage to both. This ability allows her to harass opponents in lane and quickly clear minion waves.

Her W ability, Strut, grants her bonus movement speed when she hasn't taken damage recently. This ability helps her reposition in fights and chase down fleeing enemies. Additionally, it synergizes well with her passive, allowing her to quickly apply Love Tap to multiple targets.

Miss Fortune's E ability, Make It Rain, rains down bullets in a target area, slowing enemies and dealing damage over time. This ability is great for crowd control and can be used to set up kills or disengage from dangerous situations.

Finally, her ultimate ability, Bullet Time, is a devastating barrage of bullets that she fires in a cone in front of her. This ability deals massive damage to all enemies caught in its path and can turn the tide of team fights when used effectively.

Miss Fortune's strengths lie in her ability to deal consistent damage from a safe distance. Her high attack speed and area-of-effect abilities make her a threat in team fights, especially when paired with a support who can provide crowd control or healing. Her mobility with Strut allows her to reposition and kite enemies, making her difficult to catch.

However, Miss Fortune also has weaknesses that players should be aware of. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility when her W ability is on cooldown. This makes her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, her ultimate ability, Bullet Time, can be interrupted by crowd control, so timing and positioning are crucial when using it.

In the world of League of Legends, Miss Fortune has become an iconic champion, known for her striking appearance and deadly skills. Her story of seeking revenge and becoming a feared bounty hunter resonates with players, and her gameplay offers a satisfying mix of damage and utility.

Explore Miss Fortune's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Miss Fortune and her various appearances in League of Legends, you can find detailed information and videos on her dedicated page. Discover her classic look, as well as other skins such as Arcade Miss Fortune, Star Guardian Miss Fortune, and more. Immerse yourself in the world of Miss Fortune and experience the thrill of being a deadly bounty hunter.

Miss Fortune (Candy Cane Miss Fortune)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: December 14, 2010

Miss Fortune, the Bounty Hunter, is a popular champion in the game League of Legends. Known for her deadly aim and seductive charm, she has become a fan favorite since her release in 2010. Over the years, Miss Fortune has received various skins, each offering a unique twist to her character. One such skin is the delightful

Released on December 14, 2010, the Candy Cane Miss Fortune skin is a festive and whimsical take on the champion. It transforms Miss Fortune into a charming and playful character, perfect for spreading holiday cheer on the Summoner's Rift. This skin is available for purchase at a cost of 1350 RP, allowing players to enjoy the holiday spirit while playing as their favorite bounty hunter.

The Candy Cane Miss Fortune skin features a complete visual overhaul, giving Miss Fortune a candy-themed makeover. Her usual pirate-inspired attire is replaced with a vibrant red and white outfit, resembling a classic candy cane. Her hat is adorned with a fluffy white trim, and her boots are replaced with candy cane-striped stockings. Miss Fortune's dual pistols are transformed into peppermint-themed firearms, complete with candy cane handles and peppermint bullet effects.

Not only does the Candy Cane Miss Fortune skin change her appearance, but it also adds some delightful holiday-themed animations. Her recall animation shows Miss Fortune sitting on a giant candy cane, enjoying a sweet treat while surrounded by falling snowflakes. Her ultimate ability, Bullet Time, is accompanied by a shower of candy canes raining down on her enemies, adding a touch of whimsy to her deadly barrage.

Now that we've explored the details of the Candy Cane Miss Fortune skin, let's delve into the story of Miss Fortune herself. Sarah Fortune, also known as Miss Fortune, is a feared and respected bounty hunter in the world of League of Legends. Born into a wealthy family, her life took a tragic turn when her parents were murdered by the infamous gangster, Gangplank.

Seeking revenge, Miss Fortune dedicated her life to hunting down Gangplank and dismantling his criminal empire. With her sharpshooting skills and cunning tactics, she quickly gained a reputation as one of the most dangerous bounty hunters in Bilgewater. Miss Fortune's dual pistols, named Shock and Awe, became her trusted companions in her quest for justice.

In the game, Miss Fortune is classified as a marksman, excelling at dealing high amounts of physical damage from a distance. Her passive ability, Love Tap, allows her basic attacks to deal bonus damage to targets affected by her abilities, making her a formidable force in team fights. Her Q ability, Double Up, allows her to shoot a bullet that bounces to a nearby enemy, dealing damage to both targets. Her W ability, Strut, grants her bonus movement speed and passive attack speed, making her a highly mobile champion. Her E ability, Make It Rain, rains bullets down in an area, slowing and damaging enemies caught in the storm. Finally, her ultimate ability, Bullet Time, unleashes a barrage of bullets in a cone, dealing massive damage to all enemies in its path.

Miss Fortune's strengths lie in her ability to deal consistent damage from a safe distance. Her passive and Q ability allow her to quickly burst down enemies, especially when combined with her ultimate. Additionally, her W ability grants her increased mobility, making it easier for her to position herself in team fights. However, Miss Fortune is relatively squishy and lacks mobility without her W ability, making her vulnerable to assassins and crowd control effects.

Miss Fortune: The Bounty Hunter of Bilgewater

Miss Fortune, also known as Sarah Fortune, is a highly skilled bounty hunter hailing from the lawless port city of Bilgewater. With her dual pistols and a thirst for revenge, she has made a name for herself as one of the most feared and respected figures in the criminal underworld.

As a champion in League of Legends, Miss Fortune is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing high amounts of physical damage from a distance. Her kit revolves around her ability to quickly burst down enemies with her enhanced auto-attacks and powerful abilities.

Miss Fortune's strengths lie in her ability to dominate the laning phase with her strong poke and harass. Her Q ability, Double Up, allows her to hit multiple targets with a single shot, making it an excellent tool for harassing opponents and farming minions. Additionally, her ultimate, Bullet Time, can decimate entire teams in team fights if used correctly.

However, Miss Fortune also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Positioning is crucial for Miss Fortune players, as being caught out of position can quickly lead to her demise. Additionally, her reliance on her ultimate for team fight impact means that she can struggle in skirmishes or when her ultimate is on cooldown.

In the lore of League of Legends, Miss Fortune has a rich backstory that intertwines with the criminal underworld of Bilgewater. She seeks revenge against Gangplank, the ruthless pirate king who betrayed her family and left her for dead. Her journey for vengeance has led her to become a feared figure in Bilgewater, as she hunts down criminals and brings them to justice.

Miss Fortune's place in the game is significant, as she is a popular pick in both casual and competitive play. Her strong laning phase and team fight potential make her a valuable asset to any team composition. Additionally, her versatile build paths allow players to adapt to different situations and playstyles.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Miss Fortune, including her base skin and other available skins. Whether you prefer the classic look or want to explore the various thematic options, Miss Fortune offers a range of choices to suit your style.

So, whether you're a fan of the Crime City theme or simply appreciate the badassery of Miss Fortune, Crime City Miss Fortune is a skin that should not be missed. With its stylish design, unique animations, and powerful presence, this skin is a testament to the dangerous world of Bilgewater and the indomitable spirit of Miss Fortune.

Miss Fortune's Story and Role in League of Legends

Miss Fortune, also known as Sarah Fortune, is a champion in the popular multiplayer online battle arena game, League of Legends. She is a charismatic and cunning pirate captain, seeking revenge against the gang of outlaws who killed her family and destroyed her life.

In the game, Miss Fortune is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing high amounts of physical damage from a distance. She relies on her dual pistols, named Shock and Awe, to rain down bullets on her enemies. Her abilities allow her to quickly burst down opponents and control the battlefield with her area-of-effect ultimate ability, Bullet Time.

Miss Fortune's strengths lie in her ability to deal massive amounts of damage in a short amount of time. Her passive ability, Love Tap, allows her basic attacks to deal bonus damage to targets affected by her abilities, making her a formidable threat in team fights. Additionally, her Strut ability grants her increased movement speed, allowing her to quickly reposition and chase down enemies.

However, Miss Fortune also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to crowd control and assassins. Her reliance on her ultimate ability for team fights also means that she can be less effective in skirmishes or when it is on cooldown.

In the lore of League of Legends, Miss Fortune is a prominent figure in the city of Bilgewater, a lawless port town filled with pirates and cutthroats. She is known for her cunning and ruthless nature, as well as her desire for revenge. Her story intertwines with other champions in the game, such as Gangplank and Twisted Fate, as she navigates the treacherous waters of Bilgewater in her quest for justice.

Story of Miss Fortune

Miss Fortune, also known as Sarah Fortune, is a feared bounty hunter in the world of League of Legends. She hails from the city of Bilgewater, a dangerous and lawless place filled with pirates and cutthroats. Miss Fortune's parents were brutally murdered by the infamous gangster, Gangplank, which ignited her thirst for revenge.

Driven by her desire for justice, Miss Fortune became a skilled gunslinger and set out on a mission to bring down Gangplank and restore order to Bilgewater. With her dual pistols, she became a force to be reckoned with, earning her the title of the Bounty Hunter.

Her passive ability, Love Tap, allows her basic attacks to deal bonus damage to targets affected by her abilities. This makes her a formidable threat in team fights, as she can quickly burst down enemies with her abilities and auto-attacks.

Miss Fortune's strengths lie in her ability to deal massive area-of-effect damage with her ultimate ability, Bullet Time. This ability can decimate entire teams if used correctly, making her a valuable asset in team fights and sieges. Additionally, her mobility is enhanced by her Strut ability, which grants her bonus movement speed when she hasn't taken damage recently.

However, Miss Fortune also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility when her Strut ability is on cooldown. This makes her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, her reliance on her ultimate ability for team fight impact means that she can be less effective in skirmishes or when her ultimate is on cooldown.

Miss Fortune: The Bounty Hunter

Miss Fortune, also known as Sarah Fortune, is a renowned bounty hunter in the world of League of Legends. With her dual pistols, she brings swift justice to those who have wronged her and seeks revenge for the murder of her family.

As a champion, Miss Fortune excels in dealing high amounts of physical damage from a safe distance. Her passive ability, Love Tap, allows her basic attacks to deal bonus damage to targets recently hit by her abilities, making her a deadly threat in team fights. Her Q ability, Double Up, allows her to shoot a bullet that ricochets off an enemy, dealing damage to a secondary target behind them. This ability is particularly effective in laning phase, as it can be used to harass opponents and secure minion kills simultaneously.

Miss Fortune's W ability, Strut, grants her bonus movement speed when she hasn't taken damage for a few seconds. This ability allows her to quickly reposition herself in fights and chase down fleeing enemies. Her E ability, Make It Rain, creates a rain of bullets in a target area, slowing enemies and dealing damage over time. This ability is great for crowd control and zoning enemies away from objectives or allies.

Finally, Miss Fortune's ultimate ability, Bullet Time, is a devastating barrage of bullets that deals massive damage to all enemies in a cone-shaped area. This ability can turn the tide of team fights and is especially effective when combined with crowd control abilities from her teammates.

Miss Fortune's strengths lie in her ability to deal consistent damage from a safe distance, making her a strong pick in team compositions that prioritize poke and siege. Her mobility and crowd control abilities also make her a valuable asset in skirmishes and team fights. However, she is relatively squishy and lacks mobility when her W ability is on cooldown, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage.

In the lore of League of Legends, Miss Fortune is a captain of her own ship, the Serpent's Fortune, and sails the treacherous waters of Bilgewater. She is a feared and respected figure, known for her cunning and determination. Her story is intertwined with other champions from Bilgewater, such as Gangplank and Twisted Fate, as they navigate the dangerous world of piracy and power struggles.

Miss Fortune's place in the game is significant, as she is a popular pick in both casual and competitive play. Her versatile kit allows her to adapt to different playstyles and team compositions, making her a flexible choice for players of all skill levels. Whether you prefer to rain bullets from afar or dive into the heart of the action, Miss Fortune offers a thrilling and rewarding gameplay experience.

Her Q ability, Double Up, allows Miss Fortune to shoot a bullet that ricochets off the first target hit, damaging a second target behind it. This ability is particularly effective in team fights or when laning against opponents who tend to stand close together.

Miss Fortune's W ability, Strut, grants her bonus movement speed when she hasn't taken damage in a certain amount of time. This ability allows her to reposition quickly and escape dangerous situations, making her a slippery target for enemies.

Make It Rain, her E ability, causes Miss Fortune to rain down bullets in a target area, slowing and damaging enemies caught in the area of effect. This ability is great for crowd control and can be used to zone enemies or set up kills for her and her teammates.

Finally, her ultimate ability, Bullet Time, is a devastating barrage of bullets that she fires in a cone in front of her. This ability deals massive damage to all enemies caught in its path, making it a game-changer in team fights.

Miss Fortune's story within the League of Legends universe is intertwined with the lore of Bilgewater, a city plagued by pirates and dark magic. She seeks to bring justice to the lawless city and avenge her family's death. Her determination and skill make her a formidable force on the battlefield.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Miss Fortune's appearances, including Waterloo Miss Fortune. Whether you're a fan of her classic look or want to explore the unique themes of her various skins, this page is your go-to resource for all things Miss Fortune.

Her passive ability, Love Tap, allows her basic attacks to deal bonus damage to targets she has recently hit with an ability, making her a formidable threat in team fights.

Miss Fortune's Q ability, Double Up, allows her to shoot a bullet that bounces off the first target hit, dealing damage to a secondary target behind it. This ability is great for harassing enemies in lane and can be devastating when used in combination with her passive ability.

Make It Rain, her E ability, creates an area of effect that slows enemies and deals damage over time. This ability is perfect for zoning enemies and setting up kills for her team, especially when combined with her ultimate ability.

Miss Fortune's ultimate ability, Bullet Time, is a devastating barrage of bullets that deals massive damage to all enemies in a cone-shaped area. This ability can turn the tide of team fights and is a key component of her burst damage playstyle.

Now, let's delve into the story of Miss Fortune herself. Sarah Fortune, also known as Miss Fortune, is a feared and respected bounty hunter in the world of Runeterra. Born into a wealthy family, her life took a tragic turn when her parents were murdered by the infamous gangster, Gangplank.

Determined to seek revenge, Miss Fortune dedicated her life to hunting down Gangplank and dismantling his criminal empire. She became a skilled marksman and a cunning strategist, using her beauty and charm to deceive her enemies. With her dual pistols, Shock and Awe, she became a force to be reckoned with, leaving a trail of defeated foes in her wake.

Miss Fortune's strengths lie in her ability to deal high amounts of physical damage from a safe distance. Her passive ability, Love Tap, allows her basic attacks to deal bonus damage to targets she has recently hit with an ability. This makes her a formidable threat in both team fights and one-on-one duels.

Her Q ability, Double Up, allows her to shoot a bullet that ricochets off the first target hit, dealing damage to a second target behind it. This ability is great for harassing enemies in the laning phase and can be devastating when used in combination with her passive.

Miss Fortune's W ability, Strut, grants her bonus movement speed when she hasn't taken damage in a few seconds. This allows her to quickly reposition herself in team fights or chase down fleeing enemies. It also enhances her kiting potential, making it difficult for enemies to catch up to her.

Make It Rain, her E ability, creates a rain of bullets in a target area, slowing enemies and dealing damage over time. This ability is perfect for crowd control and can be used to zone enemies or set up kills for her team.

Finally, her ultimate ability, Bullet Time, is a devastating barrage of bullets that rains down on enemies in a cone-shaped area. This ability deals massive damage and can turn the tide of team fights. It's best used when enemies are grouped together, allowing Miss Fortune to maximize her damage output.

Miss Fortune's weaknesses lie in her lack of mobility and vulnerability to crowd control. She relies heavily on positioning and proper use of her abilities to stay safe in fights. If caught out of position or stunned, she can quickly be taken down by enemy assassins or burst mages.
